sqlMap.select: select count(syid) from qx_sy where lang = #lang#

select sy.syid, sy.url, sy.xtmr, sy.ms, sy.symc, sy.lang, (select name from p_code c where sy.xtmr = c.value and c.lang = #appLang# and c.code_type = 'sylx') as name from qx_sy sy where sy.lang = #lang#
order by sy.xtmr
select syid, url, xtmr, ms, symc, lang from qx_sy where syid = #syid# and lang = #lang#
select 1 from qx_sy where symc = #symc# and lang = #appLang#
sqlMap.insert: insert into qx_sy (syid, url, xtmr, ms, symc, lang) values (#syid#, #url#, #xtmr#, #ms#, #symc#, #lang#)
sqlMap.update: update qx_sy set xtmr = '02' where lang = #lang#
update qx_sy set url = #url#, xtmr = #xtmr#, ms = #ms#, symc = #symc#, lang = #lang# where syid = #syid# and lang = #lang#
sqlMap.delete: delete from qx_sy where syid = #syid# and lang = #lang#
